content: knitting badge neckerchief knitting badge neckerchief this cute little garter neckerchief is a must have for summer or when you just want to feel like you are in the scouts the knitting badge neckerchief can easily be whipped up in one sitting although you could make it any size you want and if you make it really large it might not be that quick use cotton or linen yarn for a cute summer accessory or wool for a little neck warmer for early spring and autumn knit this with any yarn and on any size needles following the simple repeat until you get a size you re happy with the samples made on 2 5mm needles work perfectly to tie around your neck and the one made on 4mm needles look great with a small ring to keep it in place samples images on front page yarn and tools pink scarf right grab whatever yarn you want needles 4mm grab any needle size that makes you happy yarn sandnes line see the details of the samples as examples 53% cotton 33% viscose 14% linen 2 x stitch markers meterage 34g / 75m 1 x tapestry needle for weaving in ends size after blocking 80 cm x 25 cm 4 repeats before the last garter stitch section abbreviations k -
